content: There are 4 core elements to the plan: first is focusing our product groupings around common points of leverage to enable our teams to go deeper and to be more effective in serving customers and driving growth in our competitively strongest products; second, revamping our marketing function to digitize marketing motions and drive more high-quality sales leads; third, adding an efficient and scalable inside sales force; and of course, this will complement our field sales force, which will still play an important role in our go-to-market; and then leveraging our efficient India COE, Center of Excellence, our R&D center in India, to increase product investment to stay competitive and to expand our market opportunity.
